about_the_game: Reflex King of Elements is a one player game also 2D-platformer game with 10 of the hardest levels! It has 6 strong enemies you have to fight throughout the game with traps in different variations! This game come with its own health bar, stamina bar, fire blast count and money count with no time so you can play with freedom. Then it will be health potion on the stages that you can collect to regain your health and as well as fire potions to collect to regain your fire blast count! In addition, they will be hidden comic books on all stages to boost up your fire blast count and also money to collect! The main goal is to reach the end of the game and find the crown to become king of at elements! This is a very hard game so please play at your own risk!
